name: py-psyclone

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Code generation system developed to support domain-specific languages
(DSLs) for finite element, finite volume and finite difference codes.
Notably, it is used in the LFRic Project from the UK Met Office, and it
also supports the GOcean (2D, finite difference) DSL.

dependencies.name: py-configparser
dependencies.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependencies.name: py-flake8
dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependencies.name: py-fparser
dependencies.description:
This project is based upon the Fortran (77..2003) parser originally
developed by Pearu Peterson for the F2PY project, www.f2py.com. It
provides a parser for Fortran source code implemented purely in Python
with minimal dependencies.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pep8
dependencies.description: Python style guide checker (deprecated, use py-pycodestyle instead).

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pylint
dependencies.description: python code static checker

dependencies.name: py-pyparsing
dependencies.description: A Python Parsing Module.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-cov
dependencies.description: Pytest plugin for measuring coverage.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-flakes
dependencies.description: py.test plugin for efficiently checking python source with pyflakes.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-pep8
dependencies.description: pytest plugin for efficiently checking PEP8 compliance

dependencies.name: py-pytest-pylint
dependencies.description:
Run pylint with pytest and have configurable rule types (i.e.
Convention, Warn, and Error) fail the build. You can also specify a
pylintrc file.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-xdist
dependencies.description: py.test xdist plugin for distributed testing and loop-on-failing mode

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
